metadata.dc:author: Maldonado Lozano, J
Robles Vizcaíno, C
Núñez del Carril, J
Molina Font, J A
Narbona López, E
del Castillo, M L
Bayés García, R
metadata.dc:description: Authors measured urinary excretion of tryptophan derivatives (kynurenine way) in 13 healthy and 15 epileptic children, modifying the technique qualitatively and quantitatively. In both groups, they measure tryptophan metabolites before and after L-tryptophan overload, the dosage being 100/mg/kg of body weight. They found higher tryptophan derivative values in the group suffering a epilepsy.
metadata.dc:title: Estudio del metabolismo del triptófano en niños afectos de epilepsia.
[Tryptophan metabolism in children with epilepsy].
